SEARCH
Package main

Class ConnectDB

java.lang.Object
main.ConnectDB
public class ConnectDB extends Object
The ConnectDB class is responsible for handling all database-related operations, including establishing a connection to the database, executing queries, and managing data retrieval and manipulation for various entities like customers, appointments, contacts, countries, and divisions.

This class encapsulates the functionality required to interact with the MySQL database, using JDBC. It provides methods to save, update, retrieve, and manipulate data related to the client scheduling system.

    • doesAppointmentOverlap

      public static boolean doesAppointmentOverlap(int customerId, LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime) throws SQLException
      Checks if an appointment overlaps with existing appointments for a given customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The customer ID to check.
      startDateTime - The start date-time of the appointment.
      endDateTime - The end date-time of the appointment.
      Returns:
      true if an overlapping appointment is found, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while accessing the database.

    • updateAppointment

      public static void updateAppointment(Appointment updatedAppointment) throws SQLException
      Updates an existing appointment in the database.
      Parameters:
      updatedAppointment - The updated appointment object.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs while updating the appointment.

      public static void closeConnection() throws SQLException
